We've shown you may be able to stop or

We found that tumor growth in vitro was

we're about to publish two new studies.
One in collaboration with Dr. Elizabeth
Blackburn, who won Alaska Prize a couple
of years ago for discovering
talomeorase. Talomeorase is an enzyme
that repairs telomeres, which are the
ends of your chromosomes that control
how long you live. Obviously, pretty
important. And what we showed is that
simply in just 3 months by making these
simple changes you can actually increase
your tomease thereby lengthening your
telomeres and living longer. And we're
also about to publish a study the first
study showing you can change gene
expression in men with prostate cancer.
